msg: There is no need to associate the Http11NioProcessor with a socket in between requests unless there is a comet.

author: pradeepkth
msg: Multiquery optimization does not handle the case where the map keys in the split plans have different key types (tuple and non tuple key type) (pradeepkth)

msg: Do not define instrumentation tasks for projects without sources
